TaskDTO Data Type

Represents a task object.

Properties
name data type description
inc_name string The name of the incident to which this task belongs.
name string The name of the task.
regs object Information about the regulators that triggered this task.
custom boolean true for custom tasks; false for built-in tasks. Custom tasks are those which are manually created on an incident.
inc_id number The ID of the incident to which this task belongs. This is a readonly property.
inc_owner_id ObjectHandle The owner of the incident to which this task belongs. This is a readonly property.
due_date number The task due date. null indicates that the task has no assigned due date.
required boolean true if this task is required; false if it is optional. This is a readonly property.
owner_id ObjectHandle The owner of the task. null if the task has no owner.
id number The task's ID. This is a readonly property.
status string The task's status. The possible task status values are available in the constDTO (task_statuses property).
inc_training boolean true if the incident to which this task belongs is a training incident (simulation). This is a readonly property.
frozen boolean true if the incident to which this task belongs is "frozen" because of a legal hold. This is a readonly property.
owner_fname string The task owner's first name. This is a readonly property.
owner_lname string The task owner's last name. This is a readonly property.
cat_name string The name of the rollup (category) to which this task was assigned. This is a readonly property.
description string The description of the task.
init_date number The date this task was activated. As an incident changes, it is possible for a task to become "inactive". For example, if you originally say that 100 records were lost in Massachusetts then latter revised that number to 0, the Massachusetts notification tasks would be deactivated. You could later reactivate the task by entering numbers in for Massachusetts. They are not deleted because work may have been done on them. So the init_date (activation date) would be either the date the task was originally created, or the date it was most recently activated. This is a readonly property.
src_name string
instr_text string The textual instructions for the task. Note that this field only applies when instructions are added by the user. This will override the default instructions for the task. In order to get the default task instructions, you use the TaskREST endpoint.
auto_task_id ObjectHandle The automatic task ID (for tasks created based on an "automatic task"). See the AutomaticTaskREST resource for more information. This value is being deprecated in v27 and will be removed in v28. Applications using this property should switch to using the at_id property instead.
at_id ObjectHandle The automatic task ID (for tasks created based on an "automatic task"). See the AutomaticTaskREST resource for more information.
active boolean Is the task currently active? A task can become inactive when incident information changes to make the task no longer applicable. We do not delete the task in this case because work could have been done on the task.
members array of object The list of task members. If this value is null then the task is accessible by all incident members.
perms TaskPermsDTO Indicates that the current user's permissions are to various elements of the incident. For example, is the current user allowed to change the membership of the incident (stored in the change_members property of the returned object).
creator JustUserDTO Gets a user object that describes the task creator.
notes array of CommentDTO
closed_date number Get the date the task was closed. This field is read only.
actions array of ActionInfoDTO The list of actions available to the caller for execution.
phase_id ObjectHandle The phase to which this task belongs.

The FullOrgDTO (phases property) contains the possible phase values.
category_id ObjectHandle The category to which this task belongs.

The FullOrgDTO (task_categories property) contains the possible category values.
notes_count number Number of notes on this task
attachments_count number Number of attachments on this task

Example

{
  "inc_name" : "...",
  "name" : "...",
  "regs" : {
    "property1" : "...",
    "property2" : "..."
  },
  "custom" : true,
  "inc_id" : 12345,
  "inc_owner_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "due_date" : 12345,
  "required" : true,
  "owner_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "id" : 12345,
  "status" : "...",
  "inc_training" : true,
  "frozen" : true,
  "owner_fname" : "...",
  "owner_lname" : "...",
  "cat_name" : "...",
  "description" : "...",
  "init_date" : 12345,
  "instr_text" : "...",
  "at_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "active" : true,
  "members" : [ { }, { } ],
  "perms" : {
    "read" : true,
    "write" : true,
    "comment" : true,
    "assign" : true,
    "close" : true,
    "change_members" : true,
    "attach_file" : true,
    "read_attachments" : true,
    "delete_attachments" : true
  },
  "creator" : {
    "id" : 12345,
    "fname" : "...",
    "lname" : "...",
    "status" : { },
    "email" : "...",
    "phone" : "...",
    "cell" : "...",
    "title" : "...",
    "notes" : "...",
    "last_login" : 12345,
    "locked" : true,
    "is_external" : true
  },
  "notes" : [ {
    "id" : 12345,
    "parent_id" : 12345,
    "user_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "user_fname" : "...",
    "user_lname" : "...",
    "create_date" : 12345,
    "modify_date" : 12345,
    "modify_user" : {
      "id" : { },
      "first_name" : "...",
      "last_name" : "..."
    },
    "text" : {
      "format" : "html",
      "content" : "..."
    },
    "children" : [ { }, { } ],
    "mentioned_users" : [ { }, { } ],
    "comment_perms" : {
      "update" : true,
      "delete" : true
    },
    "is_deleted" : true,
    "actions" : [ {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    }, {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    } ],
    "inc_id" : 12345,
    "inc_name" : "...",
    "task_id" : 12345,
    "task_name" : "...",
    "type" : "task",
    "inc_owner" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    }
  }, {
    "id" : 12345,
    "parent_id" : 12345,
    "user_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "user_fname" : "...",
    "user_lname" : "...",
    "create_date" : 12345,
    "modify_date" : 12345,
    "modify_user" : {
      "id" : { },
      "first_name" : "...",
      "last_name" : "..."
    },
    "text" : {
      "format" : "text",
      "content" : "..."
    },
    "children" : [ { }, { } ],
    "mentioned_users" : [ { }, { } ],
    "comment_perms" : {
      "update" : true,
      "delete" : true
    },
    "is_deleted" : true,
    "actions" : [ {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    }, {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    } ],
    "inc_id" : 12345,
    "inc_name" : "...",
    "task_id" : 12345,
    "task_name" : "...",
    "type" : "incident",
    "inc_owner" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    }
  } ],
  "closed_date" : 12345,
  "actions" : [ {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "enabled" : true
  }, {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "enabled" : true
  } ],
  "phase_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "category_id" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "notes_count" : 12345,
  "attachments_count" : 12345
}
